transportAdvice: Thessaloniki's compact city center and waterfront promenade are very walkable, making most major attractions accessible on foot. The city has an expanding metro system and an extensive bus network that covers tourist areas, and taxis are widely available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cold and often rainy with occasional frost; pack warm layers and a waterproof jacket.

Mild spring conditions emerge with a mix of sunny spells and occasional showers.

Warm and largely sunny; one of the best months to visit with comfortable temperatures.
Hot and mostly dry; ideal beach and sightseeing weather with long sunny days.
Peak summer heat with very little rain; stay hydrated and seek shade during midday.

Warm and pleasant as summer eases; a great time to visit with fewer crowds.
